API Endpoints

Campaigns

  • GET /api/campaigns
  • GET /api/campaigns/[id]
  • POST /api/campaigns
  • PUT /api/campaigns/[id]
  • DELETE /api/campaigns/[id]

Projects

  • GET /api/projects
  • GET /api/projects/[id]
  • POST /api/projects
  • PUT /api/projects/[id]
  • DELETE /api/projects/[id]

Orders

  • GET /api/orders
  • GET /api/orders/[id]
  • POST /api/orders
  • PUT /api/orders/[id]
  • DELETE /api/orders/[id]

Tool Purchases

  • GET /api/tool-purchases
  • GET /api/tool-purchases/[id]
  • POST /api/tool-purchases
  • DELETE /api/tool-purchases/[id]
